CustomField.description: Asset fields to be restored from original asset on re-selection of option during an abo operation. when this setting is having at least one asset field, start/end dates will be restored by default for renew operation.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Asset fields to be restored from original asset on re-selection of option during an abo operation. when this setting is having at least one asset field, start/end dates will be restored by default for renew operation.
CustomField.label: Asset Restore Fields
